message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're interested in the product, and I appreciate your offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I understand you're still interested in the product, and I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $108? It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $107, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're still not comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $109? It's the highest I'm willing to go.
I'm sorry, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I understand you're still hesitant, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'll make one final offer: $106. It's the lowest I can go, and I hope you'll consider it.
I'm sorry, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to go any higher. I'll have to pass on this deal.
